text: Emil Bobu (22 February 1927 – 12 July 2014) was a Romanian Communist activist and politician. He was Interior Minister from 1973 to 1975. He was Labor Minister from 1979 to 1981. He was an influential figure in the later years of the Communist regime until his downfall during the 1989 Revolution. Bobu died on 12 July 2014 at University Emergency Hospital Bucharest from a heart attack.A murit fostul înalt demnitar comunist Emil Bobu, Hotnews, 13 July 2014 ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Romanian communist politicians Category:Government ministers Category:Murderers Category:Prisoners
title: Emil Bobu
